hero.title: Access to Clean Water for Turkana Communities
hero.subtitle: Discover nearby water sources and help your community thrive with reliable access to clean water

about.missionText1: Water Access Turkana is dedicated to mapping and sharing the locations of water sources across Turkana County, Kenya. Our platform helps communities find the nearest clean water sources, reducing travel time and improving access to this vital resource.
about.missionText2: We work directly with local communities to ensure accurate, up-to-date information that empowers families to access clean water efficiently.
about.locationDesc: Interactive maps showing exact locations of water sources across Turkana
about.communityDesc: Helping thousands of families find reliable water sources near their homes
about.cleanWaterDesc: Promoting access to safe, clean water for drinking and daily use

challenges.title: Challenges We Address
challenges.scarcityDesc: Turkana County faces significant water scarcity challenges, with limited rainfall and distant water sources making daily water access difficult.
challenges.travelDesc: Many communities must travel several kilometers to access water, consuming valuable time and energy.
challenges.infoDesc: Lack of centralized information about water source locations makes it harder for communities to find the nearest available water.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.travelDesc: Helping communities save hours each day by finding the nearest water sources
impact.empowermentDesc: Providing accessible information that empowers communities to make informed decisions
impact.healthDesc: Better access to clean water contributes to improved health and well-being

weather.importantNoteDesc: Turkana County experiences extreme weather patterns. Understanding these patterns helps communities prepare for water shortages during dry seasons and potential flooding during rainy seasons.

impactCards.waterShortageDesc: Prolonged dry periods lead to severe water scarcity, requiring communities to travel longer distances for water access.
impactCards.foodInsecurityDesc: Drought conditions affect livestock and crops, leading to food shortages and the need for emergency aid.
impactCards.floodRiskDesc: Heavy rains during wet seasons can cause flooding, damaging infrastructure and contaminating water sources.
